item.title: 27th IUGG General Assembly
item.description: 27th IUGG General Assembly Hajoon chaired the session “The Southern Ocean where the ocean and atmosphere meet “ in the 27th IUGG General Assembly (7⁄8 - 7⁄18, 2019) in Montreal, Canada.
